title: \*Baby Milo®
content:
Hi, I thought this was Futura at first but it's not. Anyone have an idea of what the babymilo typeface is?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Capture_4780.JPG)
author: andy_ab11

comments.content:
The logo is Avant Garde I think. The text under it is Bauhaus.

greetings Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192914/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)
Thanks a lot, that works perfect.
Actually, the font at the bottom is Blippo Black by Linotype.
